title: FS- 1906 Fred Wagner Over Sized Postcard Cubs.
author: Leon

posts.post_title: FS- 1906 Fred Wagner Over Sized Postcard Cubs.
posts.post_content:
1906 Fred Wagner Oversized Postcard Cubs. Evers looks cramped and I think someone called Chance's name right when they took the photo. 
Great looking, scarcer postcard. This is much larger than normal at approx. 5" x 6 1/2" $500 delivered  (Bic not included)


[IMG]http://luckeycards.com/pccubs.jpg[/IMG]
